alert.note: Alert for Barber; Edwards; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 11:14PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Kiowa, western Barber, eastern Comanche, southwestern Stafford, southeastern Edwards and Pratt Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1114 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dillwyn to 9 miles northwest of Aetna. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Kiowa, western Barber, eastern Comanche, southwestern Stafford, southeastern Edwards and Pratt Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Kansas.
